    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Created by VMac on 06/01/17. Modified by mpeyrotc on 9/28/2017.

    The Main Activity Activity is the class that handles all the communication with Watson. Its is the entrance point of the app and serves as the root for navigation.

        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity

      • readResponse

        public void readResponse(Message message)
        The readResponse method is called when Watson returns a response message. The method then proceeds to read it to the user with audio (if enabled).
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be read by the app.

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       @NonNull
                                       String[] permissions,

      • makeRequest

        protected void makeRequest()
        If the app has no permission to record audio, it proceeds to request permission to the Android device.

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage()
        Creates and sends a message to the Watson Conversation Service. This communication is done in an independent thread.

      • recordMessage

        private void recordMessage()
        Records a message via Watson Speech to Text and stores it into the text placeholder for the app.

      • checkInternetConnection

        private boolean checkInternetConnection()
        Check Internet Connection
        Returns:
        true if there is and false otherwise.

      • getRecognizeOptions

        private com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.speech_to_text.v1.model.RecognizeOptions getRecognizeOptions()
        Creates and returns the Watson API options to identify and translate spoken spanish language to text.
        Returns:
        a RecognizeOptions object with the proper configuration for the spanish language.

      • showMicText

        private void showMicText(String text)
        Helper method used to store the spoken message said by the user to the input placeholder in the app.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of type String that will be inserted into the placeholder.

      • enableMicButton

        private void enableMicButton()
        Helper function to enable microphone to record voice from user.

        Parameters:
